featured.text: The 60 pilot whales swam ashore as a result of (A) a large winter storm off the coast of Cape Cod. (B) a behavior currently unknown to scientists.
Since the orange trees suffered _____ damage from a storm in the summer, the farmers are expecting a sharp decline in harvests this winter.
They stormed away and never played on the street again.
A storm cloud “chased” him until he was struck.

definition.zh_def: 暴風雨；強烈的風和降水現象。
definition.en_def: A violent disturbance of the atmosphere with strong winds and usually rain, thunder, lightning, or snow.
definition.example: The storm caused widespread damage across the city.
